questions.question: What part of a dog is as unique as a human fingerprint?
questions.trivia: Dogâ€™s nose, when combined with the shape of its nostril openings, is believed to make a mark that is distinctive enough to conclusively identify one dog among all others.

questions.question: What is a group of puppies called?
questions.trivia: A litter is a number of young animals (can also be kittens) born to a mom at one time.
